General.Name: Hiconics Drive Tech Co
General.Description: Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells industrial automation control and energy equipment in China and internationally. The company offers high/medium/low voltage VFD products, elevator servo motor, and control systems; automotive powertrain systems, motor controllers, EV chargers, auxiliary power systems, and components; and energy conservation and environment protection products. Its products are used in electric power, metallurgy, mining, cement, petroleum, municipal, elevator, machine tools, plastics, nuclear industry, aerospace, wind tunnel, new energy vehicles, rail transportation, environmental protection, photovoltaic, energy storage, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Hiconics Drive Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2016. Hiconics Eco-energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.
